amendment.description: To increase the appropriation for the Hazardous Substance Superfund.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 192 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 27.
Amendment SA 192 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S1429-1431; text as modified: CR S1430) To increase the appropriation for the Hazardous Substance Superfund.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 192 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 27.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 192 proposed by Senator Lautenberg.
